name: redeeming
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making someone or something seem less bad: She took me to see a really dull film, the only redeeming feature of which was the soundtrack. It was just gratuitous violence with no redeeming qualities.
More examplesFewer examplesIt had no redeeming features. None. I hated it.The only redeeming factor in the diet, in terms of preventing kidney stones, is that people are encouraged to drink a lot of fluid.He even found something redeeming about his job cleaning toilets.
